name: Bread and Circuses (itch)
description:
Watch the trailer here

Thrust into an arena, you play as a slave who must kill to survive.

But who are you?

A nimble javelin-thrower? Or a hardy woodcutter? With choices of weapons, skills, and even the option to bribe guards, you have the chance to make a name for yourself.

Survive the day-to-day trials

Earn your fame

Appease the crowd

Bread and Circuses is a top-down gladiator survival simulator. Run, roll, and hack your way through whatever the crowd throws at you, just to make it to the next day.
